Class PoolTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jogamp.java3d.SceneGraphObject
      • org.jogamp.java3d.Node
        • org.jogamp.java3d.Group
          • org.jogamp.java3d.TransformGroup
            • objects.PoolTable

  • public class PoolTable
extends org.jogamp.java3d.TransformGroup
    Contains a pool table object.
    When constructed, returns a TransformGroup containing all the parts of a pool table. Contains no other methods or fields.

        Returns:

      • createTable

        private static org.jogamp.java3d.TransformGroup createTable()
        Creates the entire table.
        This is nested into the class's TransformGroup because it's created z-up then rotated to be z-forward.
        Returns:
        The TransformGroup containing the entire table
